messages.title: VOTE ELLIS
messages.content: Michael Ellis was born and brought up in Northampton and has lived and worked here ever since. He is seeking your support to return to Parliament and represent Northampton North. If you voted at the EU Referendum last year, it is clear that Theresa May is best placed to deliver what we need in government. Northampton North has a strong voice when Michael Ellis is in Parliament.

messages.title: MY PLEDGE TO YOU
messages.content: I have always sought to represent the people of Northampton North and their interests locally and in Parliament. Supporting Theresa May is getting the best deal for Britain. Campaigning for more funding for local health services for elderly and disabled patients. Helping local people with their housing needs. Assisting more young people to get good quality training and jobs. Continuing to fight for more police for local communities. Supporting strong national defence to keep the country secure.

messages.title: YOUR TRULY LOCAL CHOICE
messages.content: Michael was born at the Barratt Maternity Home in Northampton and grew up, worked and went to school in the town.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured £1.5 million for pothole repairs and addressed numerous local transport issues.
Helped bring about the establishment of the new National College for Motorsport at Silverstone Circuit.
